thread.title: Facebook Tries to Help Users Better Assess Stories in Its News Feed

author: Maria Armental
title: Facebook Tries to Help Users Better Assess Stories in Its News Feed

organizations.name: facebook tries to help users better assess stories in its news feed

text:
Facebook Inc.’s users in the U.S. will see a news publisher’s Wikipedia page and how frequently an article has been shared on Facebook as part of the updates the social-media giant tries to fight the spread of false and sensational information through its platform.

Facebook—battling a backlash from lawmakers, regulators and users on multiple continents over data privacy and the spread of misinformation and purported election meddling by suspected Russian operatives—has been tweaking how it presents news in the feed, the central...
